name: Gojo_Satoru
description: Gojo is a Telegram Group management bot made using Pyrogram and Python, which makes it modern and faster than most of the Telegram chat managers.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your Telegram bot token, obtained from @BotFather.

API_ID.description: Your API_ID from my.telegram.org, required for Pyrogram.

API_HASH.description: Your API_HASH from my.telegram.org, required for Pyrogram.

OWNER_ID.description: Your Telegram user ID as an integer.

SUPPORT_GROUP.description: Your Telegram support group username for user assistance.

MESSAGE_DUMP.description: Channel where bot will send logs and updates.

PREFIX_HANDLER.description: Prefix(es) for bot commands, separated by space (e.g., '/ ! $').

DEV_USERS.description: Space-separated list of user IDs for bot developers.

SUPPORT_CHANNEL.description: Channel where bot updates will be posted.

SUDO_USERS.description: Space-separated list of user IDs to assign as sudo users.

WHITELIST_USERS.description: Space-separated list of user IDs who are whitelisted.

GENIUS_API.description: Your Genius API token to fetch song lyrics.

BDB_URI.description: Additional MongoDB URI to store extra information.

RMBG_API.description: Your Remove.bg API key to remove image backgrounds.

WORKERS.description: Number of workers to run the bot.

ENV.description: Set this to any non-empty value to enable environment variables.
